name: Interlude
description: Download Interlude and enter the Metaverse!

name: Assassin's Creed Online: Alliance
description: Assassin's Creed Online: Alliance is an online mobile game set in Italy's Renaissance, developed by Ubisoft's partner, Ourpalm, for the Chinese market. Announced at the ChinaJoy 2016 expo, the game is set to allow you to explore cities such as Florence and Rome as you work your way up and join the Assassins or Templars. The game is also set to include Player vs. Player (PvP) functionality, allowing players to assassinate other players.

name: Judge Dredd: Countdown Sector 106
description: A text adventure/dice rolling game on the iPad and iPhone, and is a game/book hybrid.

name: Gamebook Adventures 3: Slaves of Rema
description: Gamebook Adventures 3: Slaves of Rema is the third entry in Tin Man Games interactive book series.

name: Voxelstein 3D
description: A free small voxel-based game which is still in development and is loosely inspired by Wolfenstein 3D. Uses Ken Silverman's VOXLAP engine.

name: The Dark Knight Rises
description: Game based on the movie of the same name for iOS and Android.

name: Kettou Beast Wars: Beast Senshi Saikyou Ketteisen
description: Fighting game based on various incarnations of Beast Wars.

name: AR Combat DigiQ: Tomodachi Senshatai

name: Bazooka
description: A black and white arcade game released by Project Support Engineering in 1977. The arcade cabinet is notable for having a built-in bazooka gun that the player uses while playing the game.

name: Moraff's MahJongg 2011
description: Expanded release of Steve Moraff's popular puzzle series.

name: Family Trainer Series 4: Jogging Race
description: An exercise game created for the Family Trainer (the Japanese name for the NES Power Pad) developed by Human and published by Bandai.

name: Grim Blaster
description: A combination of a shoot-'em-up and a puzzler. Player one controls Grim Blaster, defeating enemies with his gun. Player two attempts to crush enemies in a puzzle environment. Each time an enemy is defeated by one player, it appears on the other player's field.

name: Tap Tap Glee
description: A game in the Tap Tap rhythm game franchise featuring music from the TV show Glee.

name: The Space Sheriff Spirits
description: The Space Sheriff Spirits, is an action game for the PlayStation 2. This game is based on the popular Japanese live-action TV series Space Sheriff trilogy produced by Toei Company.

name: Tap Tap Muppets
description: A entry in the Tap Tap rhythm game series themed around the Muppets. It was developed by Disney and released for free, partially to market the Muppets Movie.

name: Vektropolis
description: Vektropolis is a first person futuristic arcade shooter coming december 2012.

name: DataJack
description: DataJack is a 2D isometric stealth action shooter originally released in 2013. In the not-too-distant future, governments have dissolved and powerful mega-corporations wage covert wars for territory and the control of information. As a freelance mercenary, you will conduct sabotage, assassinations, espionage and ambushes on their behalf to earn a living.

name: Soccer Manager Pro
description: Soccer manager simulation game.

name: Tekkyu Fight! The Great Battle Gaiden
description: Released in 1993 for the Game Boy.

name: Dimiria: The Agrarian Falls
description: A new Indie RPG, which draws influence from team based RPGs such as Dragon Age, and Diablo (although more useful companions than Diablo). Players fight to save the world of Dimiria from the invading forces of Hiristia, while enlisting the help of companions, killing monsters and saving innocents all along the way.

name: Stone Smash
description: Stone Smash is a freeware Breakout clone released for Windows PCs in 2005. Ports to other platforms would start releasing in 2013.

name: Triazzle Island
description: A tropical-themed puzzle game that takes place on a triangular board.

name: Convextrix
description: A light-based puzzle game. Match up the lights on the electric grid to win.

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Dark Horizons
description:
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Dark Horizons is a free-to-play browser-based action game developed by Nickelodeon Games, and the first game to be based on the Nickelodeon versions of the characters. The game, released in June 2012, sports a unique aesthetic that renders the characters as shadows with neon details.

The game involves the Ninja Turtles finding a trail of Mutagen in the Sewer, and following it to find the mutations it created. Leatherhead acts as the game's final boss.

name: J-League Pro Soccer Club o Tsukurou! 3
description: Released in 2003 for the PlayStation 2.

name: Garou Densetsu vs. Fighter's History Dynamite
description:
Garou Densetsu vs. Fighter's History Dynamite is a crossover title of the Fatal Fury and Fighter's History series. Similar to the slot game and boxset, this collaboration title was created to celebrate Fatal Fury‚Ä≤s 15th Anniversary. It also gave a chance for both companies to share the intellectual property for Fighter's History. The game was primarily developed by G-mode and was released for the i-mode and Yahoo networks on July 2, 2007. SNK Playmore returned the sentiments by placing Makoto Mizoguchi in KOF: Maximum Impact Regulation "A".

Unlike their game of origins, this title is a side-scrolling beat 'em up. Players travel the world looking for either Geese or Karnov. Fighting is like other games in the genre with the exception of the three-bar super gauge at the bottom of the screen, allowing players to perform their character's special or desperation moves. The computer can also use their special techniques and aren't given a particular limit. Plane switching from the Fatal Fury series is kept intact and serves as the dodge/block for this game. Stages, sprites, and music from Fighter's History Dynamite or Fatal Fury 2 are used for the main visuals.

name: Jang Pung 3
description: The world's greatest fighters gather together to stop a Nazi cyborg dinosaur. Original content sequel to the Street Fighter II bootleg "Jang Pung II".

name: All-Star Fighters
description: Known in Japan as "The All*Star Kakutou Matsuri". All-Star Fighters is the 91st entry in the Simple 2000 budget game series for the PS2, bringing together characters and locales from many different Simple 2000 games in a bizarre fighting tournament.

name: Fighting Simulator: 2-in-1 Flying Warriors
description: Fighting game for the Game Boy in the Flying Dragon series. Includes a beat-'em-up mode.

name: Gheldia
description: Gheldia is a deliberately retro RPG from Hunt Game Studios.

name: Your Memories Off: Girl's Style
description: Your Memory's Off: Girl's Style is PSP and PS2 visual novel. Unlike most Memories Off games, this is an otome game with female protagonist.

name: Memories Off #5 Encore
description: Encore takes place in December, about six months after the summer season events that took place in Memories Off #5: Togireta Film. A festival competition for creating a short movie is going to be held on February, next year, which will give plenty of time for the same protagonist, Haruto Kawai, to both make the movie and meet new girls. In this fan disk sequel, the story focuses only on three different girls: Asuka Hina, Mahiro Sendou, and Akina Ichijou. This game also lets the player experience the story from the perspective of two other characters besides Haruto. The gameplay itself does not stray from the usual recipe of altering the story by selecting different choices that present themselves on the screen at key moment in the storyline.

name: Versus Hero: Kakutou-ou he no Michi
description: Early crossover fighting game for Game Boy, with characters from Kamen Rider, Ultraman, and Gundam franchises.

name: The Warbler's Nest
description: A piece of Interactive Fiction written by Jason McIntosh, about the European myth of changeling.

name: Memories Off #5: Togireta Film
description: The 5th entry in the main Memories Off series.

name: Memories Off: Sorekara Again
description: Sorekara Again is a direct sequel to Memories Off: Sorekara which takes events during the following days to the original story. Game features three separate stories (so called "after episodes"), each one centering around the time you (Isshuu Sagisawa, the same protagonist from the original story) spent with a different girl, Inori Misasagi, Miyabi Fujiwara and Karin Hanamatsuri. Gameplay itself is pretty much unchanged, the plot changes based on the choices you select during the story.

name: Garfield It's All About Reading and Phonics Volume 1
description: Published by PC Treasures INC. Garfield It's All About Reading and Phonics is a educational game for the PC.

name: Memories Off After Rain
description: A three volume set of epilogue stories featuring characters from Memories Off and 2nd.

name: Memories Off: Sorekara
description: The fourth entry in the main Memories Off series of visual novels.

name: Crystball
description: A Breakout clone for the Watara SuperVision.

name: Super Kong
description: A game somewhat similar to the Game & Watch version of Donkey Kong 3 for the Supervision.

name: Princess Maker Pocket Dai-sakusen
description: A puzzle game spin-off to the Princess Maker franchise.

name: Epilogue
description: Rogue like dungeon crawler where you have to defeat the evil overlord that has suppressed your people for generations.

name: Serofans
description: A mini-game collection based off retro games.

name: Princess Maker: Go! Go! Princess
description:
The elements of the Princess Maker series remain intact! The ability status is up through various events, training, and part-time jobs in the field! Rival, study, part-time job and love.... The tumultuous eight years will begin on the board!

Only the dice knows the destiny!
Uzu and Cube The navigator to help your daughter. Throw a dice and go on an adventure with the friend who will decide your daughter's fate!

name: Racquetball
description: To serve, press the red button. You hit the ball by moving your player to where the shadow of the ball is about level with your feet. The racquet will swing automatically. When you serve, the ball must hit the front wall before it hits the floor. Your opponent can then hit the ball before it lands on the floor or he can let it bounce but you can only let it bounce once. It cannot bounce twice. You serve every time until you miss. If you are serving and your opponent misses, you get one point. You can only get points on rounds where you serve. First player to twenty-one points, wins.

name: Puzzli
description: Puzzli is a colour-matching puzzle game based on fishing.

name: Close Encounters of the Worst Kind
description: Close Encounters of the Worst Kind is a two-player, Space Invaders-esque game for the Commodore 64.

name: Alien Sidestep
description: Alien Sidestep is a Space Invaders-esque game for the Commodore 64.

name: Dot Gobbler
description: A Commodore 64 Pac-Man clone.

name: Space Ric-O-Shay
description: Space Ric-O Shay is a Space Invaders clone for the Commodore 64.

name: Clop
description: A spiritual successor to QWOP where Players control the individual limbs of a unicorn.

name: Mario's Brewery
description: Mario's Brewery is a Commodore 64 Mario game, released without Nintendo's permission. The game is a Donkey Kong clone, with a beer machine replacing Donkey Kong.

name: Urban Rivals World
description: Roll up your sleeves and lay down your cards! Urban Rival is a truly original, free, collectible card game. It is a game of skill and strategy that allows you to create your own gang and challenge other players in fast and furious fighting. The games are simple but intense and in just a few minutes you can control the whole of Clint City by putting your Pillz, Fury and bluffing skills to good use!

name: Pussy Flip: Purrfect Reversi
description: A cat-themed Reversi game by Kwalee for iOS.

name: Ascension: Arenas of War
description: Ascension mixes the fast paced play of an FPS with skill based classes, whilst encouraging a team dynamic in order to become victorious.

name: Australia Zoo Quest: Puzzle Fun!
description: Puzzle solving game.

name: Combat Mission: Fortress Italy
description: Turn-based/real-time tactical strategy game that simulates battles fought in Italy during WW2.

name: Fighting Mania: Fist of the North Star
description: This was an arcade game released in 2000 by Konami (also known as Punch Mania: Hokuto no Ken)

name: Towers of the Apocalypse
description: A fast paced Tower Defense set in a near post apocalyptic future.

name: Higurashi Daybreak Kai
description: An expansion to Higurashi Daybreak which adds new characters, weapons, and several other new features.

name: J.League Jikkyou Winning Eleven
description: Released in 1995 for the PlayStation. First title of the "J-League Winning Eleven" series.

name: Chester
description: Chester is an indie platformer with multiple characters that can switch on the fly, along with a world you can influence through themes.

name: Mixed Matrix Slingo
description: Mixed Matrix Slingo is one of the many Bing games that uses your Xbox Live account for leaderboard information.

name: Carniball
description: Play skee-ball in your browser and mar your Xbox Live profile with its presence forever and ever!

name: Judge Dee: The City God Case
description: A hidden object adventure set in ancient China. Take part in a rich and detailed story written by the scriptwriter of the Nancy Drew(TM) series.

name: The Super Dimension Fortress Macross Hybrid Pack
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: Survivors of Ragnar√∂k
description: Survivors of Ragnar√∂k is a city-building-management-survival game inspired by Dwarf Fortress. Manage, create, and survive through dynamic and deadly worlds. Losing is a fundamental core aspect of design.

name: Mucha Lucha! Mascaritas of the Lost Code
description: The popular Kids' WB cartoon series comes to life on the GBA in this beat 'em up game.

name: Gravity Wars
description:
Gravity Wars Is An 90s Arcade Game.

Try to survive in the chaos of this hardcore geometric battleground, customize entirely the scenario you want with up to 12 arenas available, and see which of you or your friends can survive the longest. Nearest enemies will be attracted to you.

You will need reflexes and focus to avoid every particles displayed in the screen. Other players will try to kill you by any mean to be the last one standing.

You can entirely customize the number of entities. Set this number at your own risk.
Key Features :
* Playable Up to 4 Players Using Gamepads.
* Access to 2 superpowers : a turbo and a shockwave
*12 arenas available
* Customize entirely your game
* Amazing music made by R√©no
* Full Controller Support except from the launcher to select your screen resolution and fullscreen mode.

name: Kamaitachi no Yoru Triple: Mikazukishima Jiken no Shinsou
description: Toru Yajima and Mari Kobayashi return to Mikazuki Island. They stay at the cursed "prison" mansion once again and are joined by a cast of characters including Yosuke Mikimoto, Toshio Kubota, Seiichi Kayama, Keiko Kitano and a woman named Haruko. A murder mystery is afoot where gamers go through the story from the viewpoint of four characters who look at events from different perspectives (both literally and figuratively) in order to deduce the identity of the killer.

name: Kamaitachi no Yoru 2: Kangokujima no Warabe Uta
description:
Kamai Tachi no Yoru 2: Jail Island no Warabe Uta is a video game published by Chunsoft and released on July 18, 2002 as an adventure game for the PlayStation 2.

It is Chunsoft's fourth sound novel. The previous game, "Night of the Kamai Tachi", is used as a Story within a story. The sequel is "Kamaitachi no Yoru x3: Crescent Moon Island Case no Shinsou".

name: Pendulous
description: A challenging pendulum trip through a steam-driven clockwork world. Swing from anchor to anchor, using shifting pipes and steam jets to hurry you to a fast finish.

name: Angry Business Man
description: Platformer.

name: Know How 2: Think and Play outside the box!
description: Puzzle game.

name: Crazy Quiz
description: Quiz game.

name: City Bus
description: City Bus is an arcade game where you play the role of a crazy bus driver and distribute passengers without the traffic regulations. If you want to rampage through the city, ignoring traffic regulations and destroying everything in your way, you just found a right game for you. Delivering your passengers on time is the only thing that matters, and anything stopping you from that is your enemy. Plow at full speed through traffic jams, crash through the buildings, outrun the police patrols, level the whole city if you want to. The game features 5 buses, 5 cities, 6 lethal weapons, and 6 different types of missions.

name: Waterworld: The Quest for Dry Land
description: Real-time strategy game based on the movie Waterworld.

name: Star Burial Dragnir
description: A JRPG by Square Enix and Witch Craft for iOS devices.

name: Poker Pals
description: A mix between two famous types of table-top games: Poker & Scrabble. Players are dealt a hand of 5 cards per round and are to play them on a scrabble-like board for combinations similar to a winning poker-hand.

name: Tap Tap Revenge Tour
description: A Dance Dance Revolution based remix for the iOS. Using your fingers, you play some of the most popular songs with flashy backgrounds, intense & complex transitions, and earn points to improve your overall level.

name: L. Frank Baum's: The Wonderful Wizard of Oz
description: Hidden object game.

name: Day of the Zombie
description:
Land of the Dead was originally developed as a singleplayer PC game called Day of the Zombie, which had a four month development cycle and was ready for October 2004 release. Day of the Zombie was shown to Universal Studios around the time the movie Land of the Dead was being filmed in Toronto, Canada (where Groove is headquartered) - this is how the license was secured. The game was ported to Xbox, multiplayer functionality was added and environments were added to tie the game to the movie. But in 2009, Groove Games finally decided it was a good idea to finish Day of the Zombie and release it, even if the game has 2004 graphics.
The story, which is the only new thing compared to Land of the Dead, is about zombies who have invaded a town and 3 main characteres : a student who wants to save his girlfriend, the director of the student's college who wants to save his college from zombies, and a US army sniper who just wants to leave the town.

name: Word Pirate
description: The third game developed by Moonpod, Word Pirate is a swashbuckling puzzle game where your words are sharper than your blade, insults optional.

name: Starshatter: The Gathering Storm
description: A sequel to and remake of the original Starshatter, The Gathering Storm is a space combat game from developer Destroyer Studios.

name: Dancing Blade Katteni Momotenshi!
description: Dancing Blade is an anime FMV game. The player simply watches each scene as it proceeds; the only interaction is occasionally selecting dialogue choices when prompted. Depending on the player's choices, they will reach one of four different endings. Once an ending is reached, the scenario leading to that ending can later be replayed without interruption. Any scene already viewed can also be freely revisited.

name: Spin Deluxe
description: Spin Deluxe is a puzzle with physics and unique gameplay. You have to think hard in order to beat the game. Become a master of the world of Spin Deluxe and control its physical laws and properties to bring back the light of its lost Sun!

name: Dancing Blade Katteni Momotenshi II: Tears of Eden
description: The sequel to "Dancing Blade Katteni Momotenshi!"

name: Jay and Silent Bob in: Let Us Dance
description: A Jay and Silent Bob-themed IPhone rhythm game, in which the player makes an animated Jay Dance along with music.

name: SpongeBob SquarePants: Diner Dash
description: SpongeBob Diner Dash is arcade action with an undersea twist! Mr. Krabs is expanding the Krusty Krab & building an empire, and SpongeBob is the new restaurants' server. Keep him on his toes and help him earn tips, while he serves customers like slippery sturgeon, antsy anchovies, and even Bubble Bass. It's up to you and SpongeBob to seat, serve and satisfy even the squirmiest of patrons.

name: Tiger & Bunny: On Air Jack!
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: Michael Schumacher World Tour Kart 2004
description: A kart racing game endorsed by Michael Schumacher.

name: Higanbana no Saku Yoru ni: The Second Night
description: Higanbana no Saku Yoru ni: The Second Night is the second and final installment of Higanbana no Saku Yoru ni.

name: Petit Computer
description: A DSiWare title that allows you to program in BASIC and share your creations.

name: Enemy Engaged 2: Desert Operations
description: A stand-alone expansion to Enemy Engaged 2, with three new scenarios - Antarctica, Afghanistan, and Iran.

name: Fart Cat!
description: Based on the hit summer blockbuster, this first game from Summer Camp Studios involves a cat that eats food, and farts a lot.

name: Yakouchuu II: Satsujin Kouro
description: Yakouchuu II: Satsujin Kouro is an adventure game for the Nintendo 64 released only in Japan in 1999. Sequel to the Super Famicom game Yakouchuu, released in 1995. Yakouchuu GB was also released in 1999 for the Game Boy Color.

name: Rurouni Kenshin: Kansei
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: Craz'D
description: Craz'D is a flash game designed by Hubol Gordon in 2009. It's a story of a creature named Loon doing whatever the hell he wants because he fits his name just fine.

name: Joker no Kuni no Alice: Wonderful Wonder World
description: Joker no Kuni no Alice ~Wonderful Wonder World~ is the third installment in the Heart no Kuni no Alice series and is a side story to the first two games.

name: Confidential Money: 300 Nichi de 3000 Man Dollar Kasegu Houhou
description: A otome game for PSP.

name: Custom Drive
description: An otome game developped by Vridge. The game features customization where the player can change the heroes' hair style, clothing, hat, glasses and accessories. The items are called "coordinate items" and there are various ones to collect throughout the game.

name: Super Bogus World
description: Super Bogus World is a Game Maker game made by Hubol Gordon and Oddwarg after about a year of work. It's full of strange humor, awkward scenarios, and no genre is safe from this game's mocking power.

name: Seaside Racing
description: Seaside Racing is a racing game available through the Xbox Live Indie Games service on Xbox 360.

name: Let's Create! Pottery
description: With "Let's Create: Pottery" making ceramics has never been more simple and fun! Become a true artist and create "one of a kind" pottery items and share them with your friends! Throw the clay on the wheel, release all your artistic talents and take benefit of dozens of materials available in order to create your own design! Even when you glaze and fire your very first pot you will feel accomplished and relaxed as pottery is the best way to relieve your everyday stress and find your inner peace. An amazing, therapeutic and uplifting experience you can enjoy with your family and friends!

name: Combination Pro Soccer
description: Combination Pro Soccer: J.League no Kantoku ni Natte Sekai wo Mezase! was released in 1998 for the PlayStation. Developed by Kuusoukagaku and published by Axela.

name: Kenka Bancho Bros.: Tokyo Battle Royale
description: Two bros bro it up and take down a mess of bad guys in the latest PSP Kenka Bancho adventure.

name: Sushi Castle
description: A Japan-themed action-roguelike for Xbox Live Indie Games.

name: Armed Heroes Online
description: A hack 'n slash game for iOS largely known for having stolen a significant amount of assets from Runic Games' Torchlight.

name: Lode Runner Classic
description: Classic Lode Runner action comes to Windows Phone.

description:

name: Championship Manager 2009
description: Championship Manager 2009 is a cancelled soccer management game.

name: Nanna's Cats
description: A cat-based tower defense game for the iPhone.

name: Abarenbou Princess
description: Follow the adventures of the rowdy princess of the Silver Bell Kingdom, Rouge, in this PS2 RPG.

name: Dark Break
description: A 3D shooter developed for the iPad by Winking Entertainment.

name: Shooting Fever
description: A physics-based puzzle game for the iPhone also know as "Mad World."

name: Matching With Friends
description: Match colors to score points in this puzzle game for your iDevice. The game was taken offline on March 26, 2018.

name: Diluvium
description:
Diluvium is a versus typing tactics game.
Two summoners enter the battlefield and type animal names to summon them into battle against each other.

name: Gunparade Orchestra: Ao no Shou
description: Gunparade Orchestra: Blue Chapter ~Send a letter from the Sea of ‚Äã‚ÄãLight~ ( „Ç¨„É≥„Éë„É¨„Éº„Éâ„Éª„Ç™„Éº„Ç±„Çπ„Éà„É© Èùí„ÅÆÁ´† „ÄúÂÖâ„ÅÆÊµ∑„Åã„ÇâÊâãÁ¥ô„ÇíÈÄÅ„Çä„Åæ„Åô„Äú) is a Japanese game co-developed by io-spiral, Dice Corporation and Alfa System. It was the final game of the Gunparade Orchestra game trilogy to be released for Playstation 2 on July 20, 2006.

name: Refrain Love
description: A dating sim where you play as a college student who happens to live right by the campus. It's summer and you're going to America for Christmas, but you'd love to get a woman before then.Your three buddies Kousuke the jock, Tetsuya the DJ, Taizo the nerd and you vow to find a girlfriend before Christmas time. You already know some girls, so it shouldn't be a problem. But you have been having weird dreams of some mystery girl and when a walk in the park leads you to find a girl that looks suspiciously like the one of your dreams, you find that maybe you do have chance with the ladies. But, let's face it. You have to juggle part time jobs, romance, and seeing your dude friends. Welcome to Refrain Love.

name: Gunparade March
description:
In 1945, World War II was abruptly ended when an alien race appeared on Earth and began to slaughter the human population. This alien force, known as the "Phantom Beasts" (or Genjyu in Japanese) had effectively taken over more than half of the Earth. The year is 1999 ‚Äì 54 years later, mankind is still fighting to survive against the alien forces. Earth forces now use advanced mecha called Humanoid Walking Tanks (HWTs) to combat the invaders, but throughout the ordeal, far too many pilots have been killed in action.

To ensure the future of the human race, the Japanese government enforced a student draft which recruited high school students to become HWT pilots. Gunparade March follows the lives of the 5121st Platoon, which consists mainly of drafted high school students and their struggle to defeat the Phantom Beasts and at the same time, lead a normal social life. They are young people such as Atsushi Hayami and his high school class, also known as Unit 5121. This new generation fearlessly struggles on with the aid of the HWT humanoid combat machines and the devastating PBE bomb.

name: Teddy Floppy Ear
description: A race game from Poland built using unity for mac and pc.

name: The eXceed Collection
description: A collection of the entire eXceed shooter series: Gun Bullet Children, Vampire REX, and Jade Penetrate Black Package.

name: Sega Ages 2500 Vol. 30: Galaxy Force II - Special Extended Edition
description:
As the name suggests, this game is a compilation of emulated Galaxy Force games.
And there is also a "neo classic mode" which enhances the graphics and there are various sound options.

name: Sega Ages 2500 Vol. 28: Tetris Collection
description:
As the name suggests, Tetris Collection contains a number of Sega-published versions of Tetris, Flash Point and Bloxeed. Not only can the original arcade games be played, but you can also view arcade fliers and listen to the game's sounds from a special menu selected with Select.

Unique to this collection is the Sega Mega Drive port of Tetris, including full box and manual scans, and a prototype ROM of a cancelled Mega Drive port of Flash Point, both of which were prevented from being sold due to presumed licensing problems.

name: Sega Ages 2500 Series Vol. 33: Fantasy Zone Complete Collection
description:
This game contain every game released in the Fantasy Zone series (bar the redemption game), plus several "new" ones. The games are emulated, though there are handful of extra options to "improve" many of them.

Also included is Fantasy Zone Neo Classic which is an updated port of the Famicom version of Fantasy Zone, and Fantasy Zone II DX - a remastered version of Fantasy Zone II to look and feel as if it were running on Sega System 16 hardware.

The collection also includes development material for Fantasy Zone II, assorted other concept art, cover art masters, full cover/manual scans for the included games's Japanese, US, and European releases, and full flyer scans for the Japanese and English releases of the arcade games (including the redemption game).

name: Sega Ages 2500 Vol. 10: After Burner II
description:
Sega Ages 2500 Series Vol. 10: After Burner II is a Shoot-'Em-Up game, developed by Sims and published by Sega
After Burner II is an upgrade of the original 1988 arcade release of After Burner II, being presented entirely in 3D. Aside from this, it is essentially the same as before but with extra options such as unlimited continues. There is an "arranged" mode which lets you play as different planes, but it does not significantly affect gameplay.

name: Huge Insect

Increased strength, faster reflexes and agility transform a small number of humans into super humans known as "rezel". While the world is in constant flux Isle, Lefia and three other heroes gifted with rezel powers begin their tale.
The game is split into 20 chapters and the heroes gain the powers of teleport, time pause, psycho kenesis, transformation and x-ray vision as they progress. In addition, the battles are in full 3D with an XMB like interface and the heroes get skill points to unlock new abilities and Rezel Arts as well as Hyper Rezels.
The game has character designs by Eiji Kandeda who also did character designs for Aquarion and a script written by the team who wrote Arc the Lad III & IV.

Seeds can be found all over the island from other plants. The player needs to give the plant the required space in order for it to grow and different ones require other types of soil. Each plant also creates different sounds, which when combined with other greenery can create music.

name: Battle Gear 4
description:
A driving simulator where by players race street legal cars on narrow Japanese speedways.

The focus of the game is on manual shifting, drifting and quasi-legal driving tactics. When compared to the Battle Gear 3, there are certain features changed in this game.

* The addition of European models (for example, Volkswagen Golf and Renault Clio (Lutecia) V6) and the European stages (with notable examples of the Monaco track and Monte Carlo Rally) representing a departure from Initial D.

* The Takumi Mode in Battle Gear 3 is removed. Instead, a severe speed penalty is implemented into the system, forcing the player to use the brakes.

* A more extensive tuning system is available to the key users. Instead of simply modding the external parts, the performance hardwares are available as well this time. These can be performed in the online virtual garage.

* A player can also activate the "Garage Extension" functions. This includes the benefit of having a team, customizing decals, vinyls and setting names and such.

Lost to the wilderness of Shenandoah Valley, he lives in complete isolation for a hundred years until he is found and recruited in the provincial militia. The story follows a young man and his childhood friend who discover a young girl laying unconscious underneath a cherry blossom cherry one day. When the girl awakens she doesn't remember who she is but the protagonist does, she was a girl that he had a crush on in high school but who died tragically in a car accident years ago. Somehow she is alive again, looking the same as she did in high school. The title released in Japan on July 23, 1998 for the PlayStation and was later ported to the PlayStation Portable in 2005.

The original Metroid manual tells us about a deep-space research spaceship that was attacked. Pirates seized a capsule said to contain a newly discovered life form in a state of suspended animation. Rogue Dawn surrounds these events that led up to the theft of the capsule which ultimately placed the Metroid‚Äôs under the control of Ridley and the Mother Brain. The mission to acquire the capsule is placed in the hands of one of Ridley‚Äôs best kept secrets. A rogue human agent trained and manipulated by Ridley from a young age. Taken as a child from a Federation colony obliterated by Ridley‚Äôs faction she was initially just another test subject slated to undergo horrific experiments. Ridley decided to instead manipulate and mold her into a weapon, his first human servant and dark agent. Primed yet untested she is sent out on her ‚Äúzero‚Äù mission to retrieve a newly discovered biological specimen in the possession of a Federation research crew orbiting planet SR388 and prove her worth. Her name is Dawn Aran!

description: You are the last surviving dinosaur of the royal Dinosty! Don your top hat, secure your monocle, and prepare to dodge and weave in royal fashion!

name: Cyklus
description: Cyklus is a 2D puzzle adventure game featuring 100 levels to navigate an upgradeable ship.

name: Shrek's Fairytale Kingdom
description: Be a part of Shrek's world and save his swamp.

name: Academy: Tic-Tac-Toe
description: Academy: Tic-Tac-Toe is a tic-tac-toe game for DSiWare that features 4 variants on the classic game.

name: Vertex Vortex Remix Cortex
description: Vertex Vortex Remix Cortex is a remixed version of Vertex Dispenser by Smestorp. It was created as a bonus for the St Patrick's Day Indie Royale bundle.

name: Larry's Big Score
description: Larry's Big Score is a Leisure Suit Larry-themed pinball game by Sierra.

name: b*nQ
description: B*nq is a Q*Bert clone brought to the Atari 7800 by Ken Siders. The object of b*nQ is to score as many points as possible by jumping on cubes, jumping on green objects, and luring the snake cop to his death. When all of the cubes have been changed to the ‚Äúchange to‚Äù color, you will advance to the next round.

name: Birthday Mania
description:
This extremely rare game was sold in the U.S. state New Jersey by Personal Games Company. The company marketed it as a great birthday gift. About ten copies of the game were sold. The cartridge was sold with a three folded manual sheet.

The cartridge has a red label with blue balloons on it and an empty space to write your name on. Each game is personalized to the boy or girl celebrating his or her birthday. When the game loads up it shows his or her name on the opening screen. The basic object of this game is to blow out candles as they fall toward you.

name: Seaweed Assault
description: A new game by AtariAge. Players have to collect seaweed whilst avoiding hazards.

name: Alantia: Legend of Blue Star
description: Princess Erina must save her kingdom from The Dark Lord Ezikiel in this third-person rail shooter for Japanese NEC computers.

name: Red Rogue
description: Red Rogue is a side-scrolling roguelike. Descend into the Dungeon of Chaos, retrieve the Amulet of Yendor, kill all who stand in your way and return with your prize.

name: The Naked Gun: I.C.U.P.
description: Deadpan, juvenile humor and silly one-liners rule in this episodic heir to the Naked Gun throne. Crack cases, find collectibles and annoy coworkers as Frank Drebin Jr. in this point and click adventure.

name: Lil' Kingdom
description: Expand your castle, by digging underground.

name: Mix Superstar
description: Mix Superstar is a music creation game for WiiWare.

name: Overflow
description: Overflow is a puzzle game available only as a WiiWare title.

name: Renaissance Heroes
description: Renaissance Heroes was a free-to-play First Person Shooter game set in the 16th century Renaissance period.

name: Zombie Ace
description: Conquer the sky with Zombie pilots

name: Jewel Keepers: Easter Island
description: Jewel Keepers: Easter Island is a Bejewelled-clone by Nordcurrent.

name: Jam Sessions 2
description: Follow-up to Ubisoft's guitar learning game on the Nintendo DS.

name: Urbanix
description: Urbanix is a Qix-clone by Nordcurrent. You control a tractor that must evade enemies as you prepare land for construction work.

name: Super Yum Yum Adventure
description: Blitz Studios brings 48 levels of puzzle action to DSiWare.

name: Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse
description: The Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse was being developed by 3DO for the PS2, Xbox, and PC before being canceled when the company went bankrupt.

name: Drawn: Trail of Shadows
description:
Set in the years before the events of The Painted Tower and Dark Flight, Drawn: Trail of Shadows takes players on a magical journey through the distant past. Become a part of the story by following clues scattered throughout paintings to save a boy with the power to create painted worlds. Discover and confront the source of evil that seeks to possess that power...

See the world of Drawn as never before while traveling deep into each painting. Explore a fantastic garden; climb high into frozen mountain passes, and unlock the mysteries of the Ferryman‚Äôs caves on your quest to save the boy that creates the painted worlds. Who is he? What role will he play in the future of the kingdom?

The answers to these questions will be found along the trail of shadows.

name: A Day at Grandma's House
description: An edutainment game available on Xbox Live. Players can go around Grandma's house and do "chores".

name: A Day at Grandma's House in Winter
description: The sequel to A Day at Grandma's House. Players can do mini games around Grandma's house.

name: Synesthesia Amnesia
description: An Xbox Live Indie Game released in January 2011 by Robert Lane. The game is a 2D platfomer featuring collectibles and a story.

name: Sachi's Quest
description: The war between Humanity and Samarian Empire has been long running, but Sachi as part of the human resistance discovers an end game weapon the Samarians have developed and must stop it.

name: Pumpkin Smasher
description: Players control a cannon that they use use to destroy pumpkins. It is an Xbox Live Indie game.

name: Jawsome
description: A shark simulator. Players are tasked with keeping their sharks alive and healthy. They can also play as sharks and eat other fish.

name: Nikoli no Puzzle V: Nurikabe

name: Ys IV: Mask of the Sun - A New Theory
description: Ys IV: Mask of the Sun - A New Theory is a remake of the original Ys IV for the Super Famicom. It follows the story of the original, but revamps the combat to be based on a more traditional button-press system than the original game's "bump" combat, based on running into enemies off-center.

name: HyperXBall
description: HyperXBall is a game of soccer. Instead of kicking the ball, you shoot it with a special gun. The arenas are the size of a soccer field but for now played indoors. The game was designed for LAN parties but can be played over the internet as well. Up to 4 players per team are allowed and the host has many options that can be selected for gameplay. Players can get damaged from the projectiles and if you disable another player you spend time in the penalty box. The ball is 10 feet in diameter and is a bit squishy. You shoot it like you would a pool ball. The game comes with 5 single player "Trials" you run for time and score. The Trials help you control the ball so you will do better in tournaments.

name: Mr. Gravity
description: An action/puzzle game available on Xbox Live. Players alter gravity to collect the diamonds in each level.

name: Pet Soccer
description: Pet Soccer is a soccer game featuring animals as the players. It was released on PC in 2003.

name: Pet Racer
description: Pet Racer is a cart racing game released for PC in 2003.

name: Ben Jordan: Paranormal Investigator - Case 7: The Cardinal Sins
description:
Ben Jordan, a young paranormal investigator, is spending Christmas with his family when Alessandro Renzi, an Italian living in Rome, phones him for helping him in clearing his name in a murder where the victim is a priest. Our hero calls Simon Booth and Alice Wilkins, two friends sharing his passion of the paranormal, for help and soon, the trio is investigating the case... Renzi thinks he's being possessed by a demon... Will Ben solve this mystery before it's too late? 
 
Ben Jordan: Paranormal Investigator Case 7 - The Cardinal Sins is the seventh case in the Ben Jordan series and is a free and independent game which can be downloaded from the official site.

name: Rocket Narwhal
description: An action game available on Xbox Live. Players play as a space shuttle called narwhal that was launched into another dimension.

name: DeadEnd: Cerebral Vortex
description: DeadEnd: Cerebral Vortex is a labyrinth game by Membranos. As the player you explore your character's subconscious, slowly recovering your soul across 20 levels.

name: Break Blocks
description: Break Blocks is a rhythm-based puzzle game by Greater Good Games. The player takes control of an up-and-coming breakdancer whose dances moves are powered by breaking blocks.

name: Japan Pro Golf Tour 64
description: Japan Pro Golf Tour 64 is a golf simulation game, developed for the short-lived Nintendo 64 Disk Drive add-on. It is best-known for being the only title for the system to offer a form of online play. The game features six gameplay modes, polygonal graphics, and a player editor. One or two players can compete in Match Play mode while up to four can compete for the best score in the 18-hole Stroke Player mode. The game also sports a Grand Opening Mode (compete with the world's best Japan Pro-Golfers,), a Career Mode, Qualifying Tournament (you create your own player and start with a handicap of 0) and Network Opening. The latter lets you connect to Randnet and compete in an All-Japan tournament.

name: Enders Project
description: Unveiled by Hideo Kojima in May 2012, the Enders Project is set to be the first new Zone of the Enders game in a decade.

name: Descent Mission Builder
description: Descent Mission Builder was the first official level editor for Descent, developed by Brainware and released commercially by Interplay in 1995.

name: Stardom: The A-List
description: Stardom is a game for the iPhone/iPad and Android that puts the character into a role of a wannabe actor aiming to be the best in the movie business.

name: Climb to the Top of the Castle
description: A 2D action game with lots of enemies and arcade like gameplay.

name: Captain Tsubasa: Aratanaru Densetsu Joshou
description: Released in 2002 for the PlayStation.

name: Rita James and the Race to Shangri La
description: Sequel to Escape from Thunder Island. A hidden picture and puzzle game.

name: 3 Cards to Dead Time
description: The second game released by Big Fish games, this is the follow up to 3 Cards to Midnight.

name: Top Landing
description: Top Landing is a 3D flight simulator released by Taito for the arcades in 1988. The object of the game is to land an airliner during any number of adverse conditions. It is the second of four games in Taito's "Landing" series.

name: Table Top Tanks
description: Unleash table-top warfare in the all new AR Play game, Table Top Tanks! Utilizing WAAR technology, use the PlayStation Vita system's AR Cards to create a virtual battlefield and guide your tank to victory across a myriad of high-intensity single and multiplayer game modes! Players control a virtual tank utilizing the twin thumb-sticks of the PS Vita system (one for movement, the other to aim the turret) to overcome several obstacles across real-world table-top environments from an overhead perspective.

name: Escape from Thunder Island
description: A hidden picture and puzzle game from the maker of 3 Cards to Midnight.

name: Silpheed Alternative: Menace from Beyond the Stars
description: Silpheed Alternative is an Android exclusive entry to the Silpheed series. Like the 2007 Xbox 360 exclusive Project Sylpheed it is a third person dogfighting game rather than a vertical scrolling shooter like the original games.

name: Mickey's ABCs: A Day at the Fair
description: An Amiga and DOS edutainment game. General information.

name: The Book of Biblets: Part 1 - In the Beginning
description: A trivia game covering the earliest parts of the Bible. It is available on Xbox Live Indie Games.

name: Wabbits! Jumping for Fun
description: A platforming game available on Xbox Live. It is a platforming game with over 50 missions.

name: Ao no Exorcist: Genkoku no Labyrinth
description: Ao no Exorcist: Genkoku no Labyrinth is a visual novel mixed with an RPG-style combat game developed by Netchubiyori and published by Namco Bandai Games, based on the manga Blue Exorcist.

name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Take-Down - Missions in Korea
description: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Take-Down - Missions in Korea is a South Korean-made Microsoft Windows game released in July 2001. The game is not based on the Rainbow Six game timeline; it is designed for the global market but was not released outside of South Korea.

name: Mafia Returns - The Game!

name: Nyan Cat Adventure
description: A platforming game starring the Nyan Cat. Players must pass each level to defeat his enemy, Waffle Cat.

name: Don't Call Me Skyfish

name: Bible Trivia: Avatar Edition
description: An Xbox Live indie game. It is a sequel to Bible Trivia now featuring avatars.

name: Abra Academy: Returning Cast

name: Hydra Castle Labyrinth
description: Hydra Castle Labyrinth is a Japanese action-adventure game. The gameplay style is inspired by Maze of Galious for the MSX.

name: Neptune's Secret
description: Neptune's Secret is a hidden objects game for the PC and Mac.

name: The Bunny Game
description: A board game aimed towards children. Players must try to go around the board to get to the carrot patch.

name: Angry Fish
description: An Xbox Live Indie Game that clones Angry Birds. Players are tasked with obliterating the bird's homes.

name: Quiz Nihon Mukashi Banashi: Athena no Hatena
description: Quiz/Trivia game released in 1992 for the Game Boy.

name: Echoes of the Past: The Castle of Shadows
description: Echoes of the Past: The Castle of Shadows is a hidden object game.

name: Burn the Rope Worlds
description: Sequel to the popular hit Burn the Rope. You still solve puzzles by burning ropes.

name: TanZen
description: A tangram puzzle game for iOS. Drag, drop, rotate and flip puzzle pieces to fill in a shape outline, without overlapping any of the pieces.

name: TriZen
description: A polyiamond puzzle game for iOS. Drag, drop, rotate and flip puzzle pieces to fill in a shape outline, without overlapping any of the pieces.

name: Dreadline
description: An action RPG/RTS hybrid where you control a team of monsters, equipped with a time machine, who visit human calamities to kill those who are already doomed to die in various human tragedies from history.

name: 3D Game Collection: 55 in 1
description: 55 games in one - loads of fun and plenty of new challenges! Discover a huge variety of games set in three atmospheric themes, space, an idyllic meadow, and a pirate bay. Marvel at the fascinating 3D animations which make this game collection a special experience.

name: Zatch Bell! Electric Arena
description: Zatch Bell! Electric Arena is a fighting game based on the Zatch Bell! anime/manga that was released on Game Boy Advance in the U.S. and Japan. It was developed by Banpresto and published by Bandai.

name: Hakai-ou: King of Crusher
description: You are a Japanese salary man, normal in every way... except that you've just been bitten by an evil space insect, turning you from a regular man into a rage-fueled monster. Destroy anything you can to fill your dopamine gauge, and reach the end of the stage to continue your transformation from a normal human into an enormous kaijuu monster, all the while avoiding the police and the military trying to stop you.

name: Mirai Nikki RE: Write - 13nin-me no Nikki Shoyuusha
description: Mirai Nikki (Future Diary) RE:Write is a new game to the franchise where you control the events of the Survival Game! Featuring A new Character Azami Kirisaki - The 13th from Mirai Nikki: The 13th Diary Holder.

name: Diamond Mine II
description: Top-down action game for several 8-Bit home computers.

name: Sour Patch Kids: Sour Fling
description: A physics based platformer for iOS

name: Simple Characters 2000 Series Vol. 15: Cyborg 009 - The Block Kuzushi
description:
Simple Characters 2000 Series vol. 15: The Block Kuzushi is a breakout game featuring characters of the manga series Cyborg 009, an unlockable picture gallery and 2 game modes:

- Story mode: Advance through the story passing the game stages.
- Survival mode: Only one live to complete the stages.

name: Contract Killer
description:
They might call you an enforcer, or an assassin. Call it what you like - you're a CONTRACT KILLER. 
Pulled into a world of bounty hunters, mobsters and criminals, you must check in with your contacts and accept SECRET MISSIONS that only you can handle. Select your WEAPON OF CHOICE from an inventory of sniper rifles, assault rifles and machine guns. Locate your target, zoom in, take aim and GO FOR THE HEADSHOT to earn cold hard cash. You might eliminate a crime boss and escape without being spotted, or you might walk straight into an AMBUSH...

name: Foster's Home for Imaginary Friends: The Golden Paddleball
description: An edutainment game for the Leapster. Players must find the golden paddle ball.

name: SpongeBob SquarePants: Fists of Foam
description: An edutainment game for the Didj. It is a side-scrolling Beat 'Em Up.

name: Disney Fairies: Tinkerbell and the Lost Treasure
description: A game geared towards girls for the Didj. Players solve math problems to unlock the treasure.

name: Wolverine and the X-Men
description: A spelling game for the Didj, the Leapster, and the Leapster Explorer. Players search for letters while fighting enemies.

name: Nicktoons: Android Invasion
description: A math game for the Didj. Featuring characters from Nickelodeon cartoons, players must solve math facts to defeat enemies.

name: Doodle God 2
description: The sequel to the popular game Doodle God. There are now over 300 elements.

name: Six Guns
description: Six Guns is a Western-themed shooter for mobile devices.

name: Super Chicks
description: A math facts game for the Didj. Made for girls, it mostly involves going around and fighting crime!

name: Star Wars: Jedi Trials
description: A science game for the Didj. It takes place during the Clone Wars.

name: Dungeon Hunter 2
description:
The second part of the game is a continuation of a large-scale epic adventure in the style of dark fantasy
Take a journey to the Gothic era, 25 years after the events of the first part, as the son of an immortal king. Reveal the secret of a conspiracy against your kingdom, breaking through large dungeons and even more ferocious monsters. The game captures with its amazing graphics, physics and gameplay. There are more rivals, they have become smarter, and the world itself has increased almost 5 times. The game has a multiplayer. Three players, a representative of each class (warrior, thief and magician) will cut and burn their way through the long-suffering world of the game.

name: Neopets: Quizara's Curse
description: A language arts game for the Didj. After you play through the levels, you get quizzed by the games boss, Quizara.

name: Puzzle by Nikoli V: Slitherlink
description: The original puzzle "Slitherlink" that connects dots with lines, presented by the world-famous puzzle production group Nikoli, is now available on PS Vita. Using the numbers written in the squares as hints, connect the dots with lines according to the rules to make one ring. In this work, 50 puzzles are recorded, from simple to difficult.

name: Jetpack Heroes
description: A game that comes with the Didj. You fly around on a jetpack dodging enemies, collecting points, and solving math problems.

name: Captain Tsubasa: Ougon Sedai no Chousen
description: In Captain Tsubasa: Ougon Sedai no Chousen the protagonist, who has passed the Japanese national team's entry test, with his friends Tsubasa and Hinata, will overcome the harsh practice and aim for the best in the world. Includes events based on the original, and events where Ishizaki and other friends instruct the training camp. The game is a semi-real-time command selection method. Tsubasa's drive shoot and Hyuga's special shoot burst in 3D! Depending on practice, the hero may be able to hit those deadly shots!? Can the golden generation warriors defeat numerous powerhouses and open up the world's top door?

name: Captain Tsubasa J: The Way to World Youth
description: The fourth and last Captain Tsubasa game released on the Super Famicom. Takes its inspiration from a sequel anime series released in the 90s rather than the 80s original.

name: Epic Monsters
description: Control an entire city and the kaiju that lives there. Defeat your rivals monster and destroy there city.

name: Shark Dash
description: Shark Dash is an Angry Birds style puzzle game. It contain 96 levels to finish the game.

name: TNA Wrestling Impact!
description: TNA Wrestling Impact! is the second TNA game for the iPhone.

name: Capcom Quiz: Hatena? no Daibouken
description: Released in 1990 for the Game Boy.

name: Gangstar Rio: City of Saints
description: Gangstar Rio: City of Saints is an open-world crime game. It is also the fourth installment of Gangstar Series. According to the plot you should play for a criminal, not wishing to reckon with standards of the law and public morals. You can shoot, drive around the city in the stolen cars, be involved in criminal fights. The action of the game happens in Rio de Janeiro. There are more than 60 various tasks plus a set of casual events. Also in the game there‚Äôs a postscoring of weapon and cars.

name: World of Mercenaries
description: City Interactive is publishing this free-to-play shooter.

name: Ore no Imouto ga Konna ni Kawaii Wake ga Nai Portable ga Tsuzuku Wake ga Nai
description: Ore no Imouto ga Konna ni Kawaii Wake ga Nai Portable ga Tsuzuku Wake ga Nai is an expanded version of the comedy romantic visual novel Ore no Imouto ga Konna ni Kawaii Wake ga Nai Portable. It includes two discs with the first being an updated version of the original game and a second disc with additional elements added in.

name: Mercenary Ops
description: Mercenary Ops is a free-to-play online third-person shooter in development at Yingpei Games. It is slated to release for PC in summer 2012.

name: Mystery Solitaire: Secret Island
description: Mystery Solitaire: Secret Island is a solitaire/hidden object game hybrid for the PC.

name: Pazuru in Airou
description: Airu village has been rather quiet these days, and the elder is feeling lonely. To bring energy and activities back to the village, he uses the gem stones the Airus found in the mines to create a puzzle game. Welcome to the puzzle festival. The victor is getting his wish granted, so all the cats and even some of the monsters, such as Jingaoh and Iiankuk drop everything that they are doing to play. The rules are simple, just line up the gem stones around the bomb and blast them away before the screen chokes up. Every time you blast the stones away, you'll get a chance to send your opponents the annoying Donguri blocks. This is the chance where even the smallest of cats can defeat the big bad dragon.

name: Monster Hunter Diary: Poka Poka Airu Village G
description: An expansion for Monster Hunter Diary, adding more monsters, quests and characters. You play as the Felyne cat people.

name: Formation Soccer 95: della Serie A
description: A soccer game based licensed by the Italian Football League. Its structure is different from the Super Famicom version.

name: Space Shuttle Mission 2007
description: A Space Shuttle Simulator for PC. Experience Space Shuttle missions in detail, from pre-launch to in-orbit operations, to re-entry and landing safely on earth.

name: I Spy Junior: Puppet Playhouse
description: I Spy Junior: Puppet Playhouse is a hidden object based on the I Spy book line.

name: Eden to Greeeen
description: Eden to GREEEEN is a "tower offense" game for Android from iNiS.

name: The Three Stooges: Treasure Hunt Hijinks
description: The Three Stooges: Treasure Hunt Hijinks is a hidden objects game based on The Three Stooges.

name: Dr. Wise: Medical Mysteries
description: Dr. Wise: Medical Mysteries is a hidden object game for the PC.

name: Lost in Time: The Clockwork Tower
description: Lost in Time: The Clockwork Tower is a hidden objects game for multiple platforms.

name: Hidden in Time: Looking-glass Lane
description: Hidden in Time: Looking-glass Lane is a hidden object game for the PC and Mac.

name: Mystery of Mortlake Mansion
description: Mystery of Mortlake Mansion is a hidden objects game for the PC.

name: Body Glove Bluewater Hunter
description: Body Glove Bluewater Hunter is game based on the sport of spearfishing. Travel to different locations to hunt different species of fish and overcome the dangers involved.

name: Koushien Pocket
description: Koushien Pocket is a Japanese baseball game for the Game Boy Color.

name: Konchuu Fighters
description: Konchuu Fighters is a bug breeding game for the Game Boy Color.

name: Zombies, Run!
description: A zombie survival strategy game meets jogging companion app for iOS and Android, featuring an ongoing audio story to go along with your running from hordes of the living dead.

name: Storybricks
description: Storybricks is an storytelling tool for letting players tell and play stories in computer role-playing games (RPGs), including massively multiplayer online (MMO) games. It uses a visual editing system for describing and controlling non-player characters (NPCs)

name: Touhou Soujinengi: The Genius of Sappheiros
description: Touhou Soujinengi: The Genius of Sappheiros is a fan-made Touhou Project game and a traditional turn-based RPG released at Comiket 78, heavily influenced by traditional console roleplaying games such as the SaGa Series. Despite being an RPG, it follows a traditional Touhou stage-based format, with each stage being its own dungeon.

name: Cut the Birds
description: A Fruit Ninja clone. It involves the Angry Birds where you have to "cut" them.

name: International Cricket
description: International Cricket is one of the few NES titles released exclusively in Australia. It is the brother game of Aussie Rules Footy. The player can choose from eight teams; Australia, England, India, New Zealand, Pakistan, South Africa, Sri Lanka, and West Indies. Additionally there is a hidden team called The Beam Team, where each of the developers' portraits is represented by Sonic the Hedgehog. From the menu there are different types of play modes the player can choose from.

name: Metal Fight Beyblade Portable: Chouzetsu Tensei! Vulcan Horuseus
description: Metal Fight Beyblade Portable: Chouzetsu Tensei Vulcan Horuseus is an Action game, developed by Amble and published by Takara Tomy, which was released in Japan in 2010.

name: NextRev: Gyouseishoshi Shiken
description: Edutainment title focusing on the administrative scrivener test.

name: Gindama Oyakata no Jissen Pachinko Hisshouhou
description: A pachinko simulator released in 1995 for the Super Famicom. Published by Sammy Corporation and features machines from Heiwa and Sankyo.

name: Zen-Nippon Pro Wrestling: Fight da Pon!
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: Big City Adventure: New York City
description: Travel to New York City to find hidden objects.

name: Big City Adventure: Sydney, Australia
description: G'day mate! Travel to Sydney to find hidden objects.

name: Big City Adventure: Vancouver
description: Travel to Vancouver to find hidden objects.

name: American Pickers: The Road Less Traveled
description: American Pickers: The Road Less Traveled is a hidden objects game using the American Pickers license.

name: Mystery P.I.: The London Caper
description: Mystery P.I.: The London Caper is another entry in the hidden object series.

name: Adventure Quiz 2: Hatena? No Dai-Bouken
description: The first sequel to Adventure Quiz Capcom World.

name: Mystery P.I. ~Kieta Film~
description: Mystery P.I. ~Kieta Film~ is a Japanese hidden object game for the 3DS.

name: F1 Tornado
description: A flight action game inspired by After Burner.

name: Kabod Online
description: A free to play MMO developed (and published) by Korean company Kabod Entertainment in Gamebryo engine. The game is mainly advertised as an MMORPG with "adult themes".

name: Federation Quest 1: BSS Jane Seymour
description: A sci-fi action game with a first-person perspective. The player must fix a series of starships with failing systems before they explode, contending with runaway alien lifeforms throughout.

name: Picross e2
description: This is the sequel to "Picross e" with a navigation feature to make gameplay even smoother.

name: .hack//Versus
description: .hack//Versus is a 3D fighting game set in the .hack universe. The game is bundled with the film .hack//Sekai no Mukou ni on a single hybrid Blu-ray disc.

name: Sprocket Junkie
description: Sprocket Junkie is based on the 1996 classic Rocket Jockey. This vehicular combat game features grapple hooks mounted on rocket engines, a unique cast of characters, traps and power ups.

name: Kikuni Masahiko: Jirushi Warau Fukei-san Pachi-Slot Hunter
description: Released in 1994 for the PlayStation.

name: Katekyo Hitman Reborn! Kizuna no Tag Battle
description: Katekyo Hitman Reborn! Kizuna no Tag Battle is a fighting game based on the Katekyo Hitman Reborn! anime series on PlayStation Portable

name: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!: Battle Arena 2 - Spirit Burst
description: Katekyo Hitman Reborn! Battle Arena 2 - Spirit Burst is the sequel of Katekyo Hitman Reborn! Battle Arena.

name: Baseball Mogul 2012
description: The 2012 entry of the Major League Baseball sim.

name: Strata Scavenger
description: A game being developed by Slant Six Games.

name: Fibble: Flick 'n' Roll
description: Mobile and iPad game developed by Crytek.

name: Redemption: Liar
description: Remake of the Korean Action RPG "Liar: Legend of Sword 2" released in 2010 for the GP2X WIZ.

name: Liar: Legend of the Sword 2
description: Korean Action RPG for the PC-DOS, second title in the Liar's franchise.

name: Liar: Legend of the Sword
description: Korean Action RPG for the Apple II, first title in the Liar's franchise.

name: The Idolmaster: Gravure for You! Vol. 6
description:
Gravure For You! is a sub-series of The Idolmaster series. Instead of producing the idols, the focus of the game is photoshoots. The player takes pictures of the idols posing in various outfits on different backgrounds. Each volume was released bundled with Blu-Ray releases of episodes of The Idolmaster anime series. Each game features songs from previous games, plus a new remix. Each available idol has their own song, with the featured idol getting the new remix.

In Vol. 6, the idol focus is on Makoto Kikuchi, and the new remix is "MAKOTO BlackMIX." The locations are Studio Set and Classroom, the outfits are Devil Swimsuit and My Dear Vampire, and the accessories are Heart of Vampire and the optional Vampire Mouthpiece.

name: Escape from NOM
description: Escape from NOM is a puzzle game for the iPhone platform.

name: Jump O'Clock
description: Jump O'Clock is an action game for the iPhone.

name: Stranded: Mysteries of Time
description: Stranded: Mysteries of Time is an action/adventure game for the iPhone and Android.

name: Men vs Machines
description: Men vs Machines is an action game for the iPhone.

name: Stolen in 60 Seconds
description: Stolen In 60 Seconds tactical game which aims to make the perfect robbery. Gameplay is divided into two phases. The first phase of preparation and planning. name: Dungeon Fighter Live: Fall of Hendon Myre
description:
A port of Dungeon Fighter Online for the Xbox 360.
Supported 4 player online or offline co-op with 3 playable characters: Slayer, Fighter and Gunner

"Hack-and-slash action and 2D side scrolling meet multiplayer mania in Dungeon Fighter LIVE: Fall of Hendon Myre. Take on the role of three classic Dungeon Fighters‚ÄîSlayer, Gunner, and Fighter‚Äîto defend Hendon Myre from monsters spreading Phantasmalia. Customize your heroes by creating and enhancing gear, and deliver unique attacks by chaining and combining skills, all while playing with up to 4 players on the same console or via Xbox LIVE!"

name: Adrenalin
description:
Adrenalin is a arcade racer/management game published by 1C games.

Adrenalin is a game that successfully blends the genres of thrilling adrenalin-pumping racing and an economic management sim. The aim of a player is to not only become the fastest driver around, but to be a talented manager as well. In the beginning of the game the player has to pick out one of the twelve beautiful young ladies. One of them even exists in reality - she is the winner of Miss Russia contest in 2003.

name: Fray in Magical Adventure CD: Xak Gaiden
description: Fray is a young girl whom Latok has saved during the events of Xak. Fray falls in love with Latok and decides to prove him that she can be more than just a damsel in distress. She studies magic in a university for three years and afterwards begins a long journey to find Latok and to help him in his battle against evil.

name: Monster Island
description:
Monster thugs are on the loose harassing the inhabitants of the colorful world of Monster Island. Now, it's up to you and your arsenal of mini-monster bombs to get rid of this plague of unwanted visitors. Can you stand against such mischievous foes?

Unlock five different monster bombs, each with its own abilities: Rocko, Sticky, Xplode, Blui and the fearsome Don Tonator! Toss them at enemies over 3 worlds and 200 reactive puzzles which will dazzle you for many hours of unparalleled fun.

Change your character in the store to get new and cool looks.

Title was delisted from all platforms on May 16th 2022.

name: Le Mans
description: "Le Mans" is a car racing game where you need to drive as far as possible in a certain time. By overtaking other racers (which partially have a bit of an unconventional driving style, which does not make it easier) without causing a crash, points are added to your account (1000 points per 10 cars). If you reach more than 20.000 points before the time has run out, you receive further time units and you can go on driving. Next to the normal track you need to master driving on ice, in curves, at night and on motorways. If you crash you need to drive into the mobile garage (PIT), which is at the left roadside, which costs you valuable seconds. Additionally the number of cars overtaken until now is set to zero.

name: Akko de Pon! Ikasama Hourouki
description: Akko de Pon! Ikasama Hourouki is a mahjong game that aims to win by making full use of Ikasama skills. It's possible to use the Wii Remote to control tricks that only mahjong lovers know, such as ‚Äúbukkake pulling out‚Äù, ‚Äúswallowing back‚Äù, ‚Äúelevator‚Äù, etc. Enjoy thrilling Ikasama mahjong that you can't taste in traditional mahjong games! It is possible to play normal mahjong that can't use squid skills.
